pages.text:
The Herbalist Bench is used for cutting and slicing various items.   \
	  \
      You will need it for creating the imbuing cauldron along with various other blocks further down the line.
pages.title: Herbalist Bench

pages.text:
\
      \
      To start cutting your items, put them on the cutting board on the left side of the bench by right-clicking with the item.   \
      \
      Once it is placed, you can start cutting by right-clicking the board with the required tool for cutting. You can see what tool is required for cutting as well as the amount of cuts you need in JEI.

\
      \
      Once you are done with cutting, you can place the tool on the right side of the bench by right-clicking the tool on it.
